"Locking On":
"Hold <%LockOn_N> to lock on to your current attack target, which will make your camera automatically track it as you and it move. Release <%LockOn_N> to disengage the lock.

▼<#GamePad> only
By moving <%RStick>, you can change which target you are locked on to.
※Only possible when multiple targets exist."

"Hold <%LockOn_N> to lock on to your current attack target, which will make your camera automatically track it as you and it move. Release <%LockOn_N> to disengage the lock.

By moving <%RStick>, you can change which target you are locked on to.

"You can change between holding the lock on button, or only having to press it once, in the control settings screen of the options.

If there is no current attack target, the Lock On command will instead reorient the camera to face the direction your character is facing."
